attributes.action: Make Sarah Vine issue an apology for her bigoted Daily Mail article "Legsit"
attributes.background: Sarah Vine was the author of the incredibly sexist Daily Mail article issued today in which the title read "Who Won Leg-sit". I would like Sarah Vine as well as other representatives of the Daily Mail to issue an apology to Theresa May and Nicola Sturgeon who were both victimised by this article.

rejection.details:
You may wish to make a complaint to the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. 

You can find out more here:
https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
